Name: La Pampa
Review Text:

Food is good quality and usually pretty quick; staff friendly. ‚Ä¶

Name: La Pampa
Review Text: Great place with fast service and delicious meals, for example this grilled chicken was lip-licking. Comfortable too, with friendly staff. Would recommend, and it's really close to the Dam Square.

Name: La Pampa
Review Text: Wonderful food at great prices, good service, and a delightful romantic experience. My wife and I enjoyed it immensely in our first visit to Amsterdam and I returned to be even more delighted by the wonderful live music and great view of City center

Name: La Pampa
Review Text: Food tasted good but we ordered two fillet steaks and were clearly not given fillet. The waiter presented us our rump steaks, declaring they were indeed fillet. The meal was rescued by the meat being high quality. Won't be going back in a hurry. ¬£55 for two overcooked rump steaks isn't good value.

Name: La Pampa
